main.name: Meghanath
main.description: Full Stack Developer with a strong interest in projects requiring conceptual and analytical thinking. I enjoy designing websites with end users in mind.
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a strong interest in projects requiring conceptual and analytical thinking. I enjoy designing and developing web applications with end users in mind. Throughout the course of my career, I have perfected my coding skills and software best practices assurance abilities. I am a capable and consistent problem-solver skilled at prioritizing and managing projects with proficiency. In my previous roles, I contributed problem-solving, collaboration, and quality assurance toward team efforts and business improvements. I am progressive minded and in tune with new developments in my field. I have proven to be effective and collaborative with strong critical thinking talents. I enjoy collective brainstorming sessions which allow me to coordinate activities to achieve a common goal.I want to bring my passion and energy to a company that is doing meaningful work and striving to create values for society.

testimonials.text: Meghanath was a great team player with good leadership qualities. He was my partner in 2 of our projects and he was extremely goal oriented and hardworking person
Meghanath showed great passion in learning and coding. He was very focused and determined to achieve his goals during the bootcamp. I have witnessed his hardwork and enthusiasm on his projects
testimonials.user: Vasily Klimkin... Instructor & mentor @ Lighthouse Labs
